item.title: Announcing the 'emstreeR' package
item.description: Everyone who is addicted to R dreams about making his/her first package. An even bigger dream is to make your package available on CRAN - The Comprehensive R Archive Network. That being said, I am proud to announce that my first R package, emstreeR is available on CRAN since the beginning of December. emstreeR is package for fast and easily computing Euclidean Minimum Spanning Trees, using ‘mlpack’ - the C++ Machine Learning library, which is called on background.
